    • openSourceFile

      public static boolean openSourceFile​(java.lang.String directoryname, java.lang.String filename)
      Parameters:
      directoryname - The name of the directory where the file to open is placed
      filename - The name of the file to open
      Returns:
      true if the named file exists and therefore opens as requested or false otherwise
